subject: Re: Website review
preview: Perfect, thanks Joel!  Kind Regards,  Reinhard Kirchner Studio Lead +61 415 413 406 Brand chemistry  brandchemistry.com.au

full_threads.body:
Perfect, thanks Joel!

Kind Regards,

Reinhard Kirchner
Studio Lead
+61 415 413 406
Brand chemistry

brandchemistry.com.au

Hi Reinhard, 

Sure, all good now on this one. We have change the validation color to white.
https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/
@joel can you please action this one... the error messages to be in white so that they are more readable. Can you please let Reinhard know once it's done. Cheers.

Ah thank you! Yes I think validation should rather display in white. Red isn't readable on the background :)

Kind Regards,

Reinhard Kirchner
Studio Lead
+61 415 413 406
Brand chemistry

brandchemistry.com.au

Me again, all sorted now. 

The error messages appear in red colour... did you want this changed?

Hi Reinhard, 

Sure we have looked into this.

It's a hubspot issue. There are some errors being 'hidden' things like phone number length, restrictions etc. If the fields are not being completed correctly, the form won't submit. We are working on a work around now.

@heath Can you try on your end? its working fine on my end. 
I tried it logged in and not logged in.

https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath

I just noticed that the contact form on the homepage isn't fully functional. I filled it in on the live site and when I pressed send nothing happened, so I have no idea if the form details were sent. Can you please check and see if there is an issue to be resolved here. We should probably have a Thank you message just to indicate the details have been sent.

Thanks
Kind Regards,

Reinhard Kirchner
Studio Lead
+61 415 413 406
Brand chemistry

brandchemistry.com.au <http://www.brandchemistry.com.au/?utm_campaign=Bc%20website&utm_medium=signature&utm_source=Email>

> Hi Rei,

> CASE STUDY pages:
>
> At a quick glance I would say the case study pages are not accurate as they are all displaying the Workplace Thrive Index graphic which is specific to only to 1-Stop Connections.
>
>
>
> In addition to 1-Stop, the only other case studies that should have a Workplace Thrive Index graphic are: ELMO, McGrath Foundation and ROC Partners, and each graphic will be different as they each display a different score.
>
>
>
> Do you want me to send through a PDF or jpeg of these other graphics?
>
>
>
> Also, I don’t want Slater & Gordon to be the hero case study at the top of the page of case studies – can this be replaced with ELMO or hipages?
>
>
>
> VIDEO page:
>
> Secondly, the video pages has a repeated still image of Kerwin Rae instead of a featured image of Nutrimetics, Coleman Greig, hipages and ELMO.
>
>
>
> OUR PROCESS page:
>
> Can the title “Our workplace strategy & design process” be sentence case rather than proper case please
>
>
>
> I will have a more detailed look later this evening and will make notes on the sheet link you have provided.
>
>
>
> Kindest Regards,
>
